dji.sdk.api.RangeExtender

Class DJIRangeExtender

  • java.lang.Object
    • dji.sdk.api.DJIObject
      • dji.sdk.api.RangeExtender.DJIRangeExtender
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DJIPhantomRangeExtender

    public class DJIRangeExtender
extends DJIObject

    Dji Range Extender Base Class

    This is class designed for maintaining information of the range extender. Developer could use this class to transfer information or parameters between app and range extender.
    Please note that Inspire 1, Phantom 3 Professional and Phantom 3 Advanced do not have the range extender.
    Version:
    V2.4.0
    Author:
    DJI Software
